website_summaries.verdict: Your best bet if you're looking for a beanbag lounger that gives you some real support.
pros: Lightweight and easy to move as needed
Firm support for a beanbag chair
cons: Microbeads have less give than foam and are noisy

customer_reviews.title: It's time to relax)
customer_reviews.text: Our family and guests absolutely love this beanbag. This is so comfy, you just sit in and it makes you feel relaxed. My son and his friends like to have fun jumping the beanbag. But there are some drawbacks: 1) The inner bag needs to be sewed more firmly as it had got torn in 2 month of use. 2) The outer bag is being made of synthetic so it might be too warm to sit in during a hot season and the fabric gets pulls and snags so after 7 months of use it looks untidily.
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: This beanbag is super comfy. My kids and I are in love ...
customer_reviews.text: This beanbag is super comfy. My kids and I are in love with it. We own 3. Only downside is that we can’t order cover replacements. It would be nice to have that option . Also one of the beanbags had less beans than the other two 😒 bummer. But overall it’s a great product. I have the lounger and the twist. We prefer the twist because it allows you to sit up just a little bit more with the option to stretch out and lay. The lounger is automatically laying flat.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: An animal hair MAGNET!! I took this out of the box and put it on my tile floor - immediately every piece of animal fur within three feet of this just jumped right on there like it was a giant dust mop. Not a good first impression. Then I sat in it. Ugh. Not only was it uncomfortable, all the 'beans' squish around and make noise. I totally did not like this product. It went back in the smashed box it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money I spent on this I was disappointed in the amount of filling. It was only filled halfway and when you lay on it you are basically laying on the floor. In order to make it usable I now have to buy at least 3 bags of filling.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money at all!
customer_reviews.text: The bean bag was delivered in a box that was damaged really bad. It was exposed to everything, because the top of the box was basically opened. The bean bag is not worth the price! Everytime My son sits on it he sinks to the floor, it's like its not full at all. The bean bags at Walmart are better then this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Noisy & uncomfortable fabric
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape of this bean bag is great, but the fabric doesn't feel great and is very warm to sit in. Also, this bean bag is very NOISY! We got it for our son to read in, and every time he moves a little, it makes a lot of noise. Very distracting. Wouldn't be good for TV watching for that reason, either.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, bought one for our 15 year old. When our new born grand baby came to visit, we put her in it and she immediately went to sleep. Awesome new age bean bag !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Krusty Bucket

customer_reviews.title: It's just as comfortable as the product it is imitating
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks the socks. It's just as comfortable as the product it is imitating. You won't be able to fit your whole body on it if you are of above average height, but a pillow helps that immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and sturdy Not something you fall into but you’ll love if looking for something firm you’ll love this Nice size
customer_reviews.author: meghan tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Hard, no give.
customer_reviews.text: Rock hard. Not cozy at all. I should have listened to the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters room and it’s perfect! It’s funky triangular shape is perfect for smooshing to get the right fit. Comfortable for adults, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Could use more beans u flat on the floor literally Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfy but u sink to the floor if u don’t balance them beans right it really could of used some more beads in it
customer_reviews.author: June Busacco

customer_reviews.title: Only half full!!! WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is useless. It arrived and it was only half full of the stuffing. It’s practically flat on the floor. There’s no option to talk to the seller or manufacturer to see if they can send filler to add to it. WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bigorangesplot

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased a Yogibo!
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased a yogibo. This bean bag lounger lost its comfort and shape 2 months in. I tried washing the cover to give it a snug fit but nothing helped. We have to squish it into a ball just to sit on it without laying completely on the floor. Not worth the money and I wish I returned it before the window of time was up.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A. Leary

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT size and shape
customer_reviews.text: fabulous! more secure than standard single layer beanies, size let’s you sit, lay, share!
customer_reviews.author: Shardaun

customer_reviews.title: Not like the photo suggests.
customer_reviews.text: Substantially smaller than advertised. The child they use in the add is tiny, not at all realistic. Other than that, it’s super comfy but a lot smaller than expected and a bit overpriced for what you ultimately get shipped to you.
customer_reviews.author: J.Patzer Photo

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson absolutely loves this beanbag. Larger than i envisioned but he just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: This is so comfortable!! My grandsons love sleeping on it
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable!! My grandsons love sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Van Zee

customer_reviews.title: I think the bean bag was good it was just HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I think the bean bag was good it was just HUGE. Way too big for my space. More my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: MI Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 exact bean bags and one is overfilled and the other is under filled....
customer_reviews.author: Cara Green

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We use it as a gaming chair or homework chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mobility-take to any area of your home, and sit in comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son and playing his PlayStation. Great support for entire back.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Such nice quality and we loved that ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Such nice quality and we loved that it came fully made with no assembly required. A huge treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the color (red)
customer_reviews.text: 10 stars... love the color (red), material is soft and good quality and it's soooo comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hollington

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bean bag. It is so comfortable. She uses it to read, do school work and jump on. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in was all torn up when it was delivered and it needs more stuffing in it. Daughter loves it still though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the twist chair and I got the large lounger that doesn’t fit in my daughter’s room
customer_reviews.author: ericka

customer_reviews.title: Cover not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the material the cover was made out of.
customer_reviews.author: jpwilson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: needed for a special use which is showing some problems
customer_reviews.author: R Scott Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old granddaughter loves it. Curls up in the chair to read.
customer_reviews.author: Rf Foley

customer_reviews.title: Too much filling?
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product today. I don't know how much filling I need to remove. It's comfortable, but a little too hard and I think I can solve the issue by removing some of the beads. They stick to everything, but I'm being careful and the design of the inner bag is quite good. Zippered compartments keep most of the microbeads under control. I'll update my review after I'm finished experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Bell Glayzer

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, comfortable - color much lighter than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, and just the right size for three small, 2 medium, or one large person to lounge in. The fabric cover has a well-set and sturdy zipper that allows you to easily remove and wash it and then replace it. My only issue with this is the color is not as described. I expected a deep solid gray, and instead received a light heather gray. My grandson is currently lounging on it with a protective throw blanket - but you can see the edge peaking out on the right, and I have included a close-up pic so you can see the color for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: The website shows photos and videos of sensory kids sitting encased in this like a nest for proprioceptive input
customer_reviews.text: My son has sensory issues, I feel this was predatory. The website shows photos and videos of sensory kids sitting encased in this like a nest for proprioceptive input. This bean bag is so stiff and tight, I don't see how anyone could get inside it as advertised. You can't even sit comfortably on it. The videos make this look like a completely different product, Feels cheap, is loud...would not recommend. Considering eating the restocking fee and returning.
customer_reviews.author: mariabelle01

customer_reviews.title: Not your father's bean bag!
customer_reviews.text: I remember bean bags from the 70's & 80's. Big vinyl balls filled with large sized styrofoam pellets. They were loud, sticky, sweaty things that always split at the seams and ended up being a Frankenstein / duct-tape monster in the end. This is VERY different. Beads are small - same used in some types of pillows. There are two shells holding them with the outer shell being a rugged but comfy polyester. This is the same wicking material found on quality sport shirts with an added touch of some spandex. The result is super comfortable - a very nice improvement to the bean bag concept. Perfect for children and even some dogs! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: While supposedly a chair, my boys have turned this into a wrestling/jumping/boxing sack. Then when they are done they lay or sit on it. They are comfy, it is also fun. This thing withstands all the abuse that is been thrown at it and is comfortable to boot. While you gotta be really really small to fit snugly in it like the person in the product photo, it is comfortable even for a normal sized person. I am 5’8”, and can make good chair use out of this. The beads are ultra tiny and make for a soft/firm surface depending on where you scoot them to. The cover is ultra soft and seems to stay pretty clean.
customer_reviews.author: Osprey

customer_reviews.title: A fun chair for small children.
customer_reviews.text: If there is one piece of casual furniture that needed an upgrade, it was the bean bag chair. And that upgrade has arrived. I don't really agree with the "squishy" claim, but this has become a desired place to sit and a fixture in play time for my son. It does take up a lot of space, so if you don't have much to spare, be warned. We have only found two "beans" on the floor, but there is no hole, so we think they were just stuck to the outside of the "bag" from the manufacturing facility. No one wants a leaky bean bag chair and we have confidence that this one won't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Shermeta

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Loves It.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family loves this 'Big Squishy' bean bag. It's the perfect size for everyone and not so big it's unwieldy: only weighing in at about 13 lbs and just shy of 58 inches in diameter. The outer covering is polyester with 10% spandex and is removable, from a zippered end, for washing. The interior is a separate bag. Usually, it's kept in our den where the grandkids get the most use out of it. But occasionally it'll get moved up to one of the bedrooms when needed there.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oterson

customer_reviews.title: Every size in your home will find a use for this (so will every species).
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several bean bags before but this is the first one that didn't come compressed with instructions to let it air out and expand.This one came fully expanded and in a large rectangular box. The bag was wrapped in plastic and very lightweight and it wasn't 3 minutes on the floor that my cat found the most comfortable seat in the house. It is a very comfortable bag and a perfect size for adults who want to be cushioned from watching tv on the floor. Kids are an obvious client of this chair...cats and dogs too. I love that it's so lightweight and the outside is removable and washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H ✨

customer_reviews.title: Comfy TV Lounger
customer_reviews.text: The Big Squishy Bean Bag chair lives up to its namesake. It is both really big, and really squishy. Using what appears to be pieces of cut up memory foam in lieu of the normal "Beans", this bean bag chair returns to form after use and is incredibly comfortable while you're sitting on it. The price is a bit steep, hence the 4 stars, but if you're in the market for the most comfortable bean bag I've ever tried, this is definitely it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Great Bean Bag for all Ages
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here- the bag is big, squishy, portable, and stylish as it claims. The cloth cover is very comfortable and easily washable. It's light and easier to manage than the bean bag I had when I was growing up, and also happens to be quieter than my old one as well. The "beans" are small, making it easy to shift into different positions for storage. It's a good size that works well for kids or adults. I could see some people might be upset that the grey color is lighter than pictured in the listing, but it still looks good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Roger N. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was like "two hundred bucks for a bean bag???" I know I'm not alone there. But this thing is sooooo cool. It's incredibly comfortable, even for a 6' tall, 200-pounder like me. It exudes quality -- as long I don't jump on it, I feel like it will last for a very long time. The "beans" are tiny and plentiful, letting you sink in without feeling like you're going to hit the floor. Bear in mind that this thing is HUGE. Make sure you have a place to store it if you don't want to leave it out.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! Very comfortable. It sort of forms itself around you and then firms up for support. I am nearly 60 and I can sit in it with the dog and still be able to get up out of it. It is lightweight, so no problems moving it around. The only thing I notice about it is that the cover seems a little too big for the contents. Even when you are sitting in it, the corners are empty and floppy. I tried redistributing things, but the inside is contained and there really isn't anywhere for it to go. All in all I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Floyd

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! This chair is amazing!!! At first when i saw this and saw the price...i was like...really!?!? But i decided to get it and now i am so happy i did!! This is my favorite place to sit in the house now!! I sit in it for reading, watching tv, reading books to my kids, then my kids and my pets fight over it. I might have to buy a couple more and get rid of thw couch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Passed the grandchild test!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sturdy. I got it because it's big enough for my two grandkids (ages 8 & 10) to share while watching TV. Did I say share? They pushed each other off, lifted the sides to dump each other off, jumped on it like a trampoline, and spilled on it. It took the abuse and kept its shape—didn't collapse like the old beanbag chairs we used to have in the 70s. The cover comes off for washing. It doesn't show in the picture, but the cover is a kind of heathery gray - attractive, soft, and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Editor

customer_reviews.title: I love beanbags but many of them don't have removable or ...
customer_reviews.text: Spoiler alert: it is big and squishy. I love beanbags but many of them don't have removable or washable covers, and they get gross really fast. Incredibly comfortable (the micro beads really DO mold perfectly to your body) and awesome for kids to play on OR as bonus seating to watch a movie. Since you can adjust it to perfection, this would also be a really nice option for when you need to sleep upright due to a cold.
customer_reviews.author: runningoutofideas

customer_reviews.title: Huge and squishy
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge squishy cushion and my kids love it! They can jump and rough house on it without any problems. It dries quickly from water spills (no experience with anything else). It is light enough weight that my two year old can draged it around the room (but awkward to impossible for him to lift). This has become a favorite reading or tv watching pillow for my kids and my husband likes it as a footstool.
customer_reviews.author: Sassbot

customer_reviews.title: exceptional, and far more portable then I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is uniquely shaped and exceptionally comfortable without being unduly heavy. My kids move it from room to room like it's nothing, and I love it! It's more comfortable and portable than I could have expected, and the cover looks clean, even as we have six kids, two dogs, and a cat.
customer_reviews.author: OneTiredMother

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This beanbag chair was average at best. Same tiny foam fill beads as cheap ones you can get at Walmart. the fabric was super stretchy, which I thought would be cool, but was actually irritating since it didn't have enough filling to hold any shape. My kids loved it, but destroyed it in about 2 weeks. I would not recommend this product; either purchase an actual cheap beanbag, or get a nicer quality one.
customer_reviews.author: BexarJoe

customer_reviews.title: It's Huge!
customer_reviews.text: We were expecting something fairly small, with the medium size. This thing is huge! It pretty well swallows up even an adult, and accommodates a couple of children at once. I love how malleable the form is—you can kind of wriggle down to create a chair-like structure, or canoe-like bed for a nap. Great for watching movies. Also, we love how the outer skin is not only soft, but slightly stretchy, and is removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Huge and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this it was huge, looked like a massive body pillow. I couldn't get it to look like the photo but I made an acceptable alternative and I find it very comfortable to sit on , no pain in my lower back. The kids love to use this to read or watch a show on and it is so huge that several of them fit at the same time. I don't know where to keep this because it is kind of awkward, but as far as being comfortable, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Good size, lightweight, comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bean bag. It feels like the ‘old school’ ones with tiny beads and not the recent memory foam ones. It is a fun shape, kind of a triangle. Makes it great for reading, game playing and TV watching. My 11 year old says it is comfy. He brought it into his room so he can read there. It is light enough that he can pick up to walk from room to room, even up stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Hiawhatha

customer_reviews.title: Loud, and only really big enough for young children
customer_reviews.text: My kindergarten-age kid loves this beanbag. He's on it all the time, everything from playing with trucks to reading. And that's fine, because i find it loud (the styrofoam pellets are surprisingly noise) and too small to get comfortable on so i never want a turn on it. And one day, the lining is going to rip and i'll have an epic mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Silea

customer_reviews.title: huge awesome bean bag
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This bean bag pillow is huge! I love it! I use this in bed to lean on for back problems and it keeps me propped up just right. It has an outer case that is removable and washable. The inner pillow part is generously filled with foam bean beads. It's super fun and comfy. Kids would love this for playing on or laying on to read a book. This is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: it is more of a bean pillow in rectangular shape
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, this is not a bean bag, but more of a bean pillow. Unlike what the photos show, it is not a round shape, but is just a rectangle. It is premium quality and well constructed with premium materials, and is meant for kids, in my opinion. The smell is much better than I would have guessed.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ah bean bags - takes me back to the 70s ...
customer_reviews.text: Ah bean bags - takes me back to the 70s (or was it the 60s?). This bag is a little less well filled than the bean bag chairs I remember - those actually could hold a reasonable shape. This underfilled bag is something you could flop down on but really does not have a shape that you can sit up in.
customer_reviews.author: Medianvalued

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, a touch overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bean bag, and fits the head of a full sized bed perfectly. I use it to lean against when I read in my study (where I have a full sized bed). Very comfortable. That being said, it is a bag full of 19 lbs worth of filler. Not sure why that should be $170 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Bukkene Bruse

customer_reviews.title: Bean bag
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable! I love that you can take the cover off and wash it. It seems well made and it's not too big. We have a large one but it's so big theres no where to put it. This is plenty enough big for one large adult and 2 big kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Not too squishy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice large size. Not as comfy as I thought it would be. Works ok for kids but their are definitely better beanbag options out there.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Yea!
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Stands to my shoulders--(I'm 5'7"). Great neutral color. Squishy, soft, and comfy. Just try to keep kids from jumping on it!
customer_reviews.author: sunday

customer_reviews.title: Great sack chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable sack I've tried. It's soft, conforms to your body and manipulates easily for however you like to sit.
customer_reviews.author: JA Wolf

product_meta.title: Big Squishy Portable and Stylish Bean Bag Chair, Large, Gray
product_meta.description: Style Name:Large Lounger| Color:GrayThe large Big Squishy has a 2 year on the seams and zippers and can be used as a chair, recliner, couch or even an impromptu bed. All products have a removable and washable cover that can be tossed into the washing machine when needed. All products are filled with special micro-bead filling which is much smaller bead than typical bean bag chairs giving you unbelievable comfort. The micro-bead perfectly conforms to your body and eliminates pressure points. This is the softest, squishiest and most comfortable bean bag chair in existence. You can take this product anywhere and its easy for even young children to move around the house and move from room to room.
feature_bullets: SOFT, STRETCHY AND SQUISHY: This is the softest, squishiest and most comfortable bean bag chair in existence. Dimensions 68in x 36in x 16in
REMOVABLE AND WASHABLE COVER: Bean Bag Cover can be removed and washed when needed.
MICRO-BEAD FILLING: Big Squishy bean bags are filled with special micro-bean filling which perfectly conforms to your body and eliminates pressure points.
PORTABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Easy for even young children to move around the house and move from room to room.
AND DESIGN: The large Big Squishy has a 2 year and can be used as a chair, recliner, couch or even an impromptu bed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars116 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 2 year warranty on seams and zippers.
